properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 2:38AM CST until January 28 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Amarillo TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches.
Winds gusting as high as 40 MPH.

* WHERE...Carson, Gray and Wheeler Counties.

* WHEN...Until noon CST today.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation will likely begin as light
rain, then change to light snow around sunrise. North winds of
25 to 30 mph with higher gusts may cause areas of blowing snow
along with sharply reduced visibilities.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY FOR THE EAST-CENTRAL TEXAS PANHANDLE
